Package com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.estimators

Class PolynomialEvaluation

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.estimators.PolynomialEvaluation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DerivativePolynomialEvaluation, DirectPolynomialEvaluation, IntegralIntervalPolynomialEvaluation, IntegralPolynomialEvaluation
public abstract class PolynomialEvaluation extends Object implements Serializable
Contains an evaluation of a polynomial and the point where the polynomial has been evaluated.
